00047   class AU_auth {
00048     // Private vars
00049     protected $connected;                       
00050     protected $userName;                        
00051     protected $pluginsObject;   
00052     protected $eh;                                              
00053                 protected $authMethod;          
00054     
00055     // Private functions
00060     protected function showLink(){
00061       return "<a href=\"?AU_action=close\" >Close this session</a>";
00062     }
00063 
00068     protected function showForm() {
00069       $output="  <form id=\"auth\" method=\"post\" action=\"".$_SERVER['PHP_SELF']."?AU_action=connect\">\n";
00070       $output.="    <label>\n";
00071       $output.="      login\n";
00072       $output.="      <input type=\"text\" name=\"AU_login\" />\n";
00073       $output.="    </label>\n";
00074       $output.="    <label>\n";
00075       $output.="      password\n";
00076       $output.="      <input type=\"password\" name=\"AU_password\" />\n";
00077       $output.="    </label>\n";
00078       $output.="    <input type=\"submit\" value=\"connection\" />\n";
00079       $output.="  </form>\n";
00080                         $output.="  <form id=\"autoAuth\" method=\"post\" action=\"".$_SERVER['PHP_SELF']."?AU_action=autoConnect\">\n";
00081                         $output.="    <label>\n";
00082                         $output.="      Click here if you want to login using any available automatic method (SSL certificate, CAS...)\n";
00083                         $output.="      <input type=\"submit\" value=\"Automatic connection\" />\n";
00084                         $output.="    </label>\n";
00085                         $output.="  </form>\n";
00086 
00087       return $output;
00088     }
00089 
00099     protected function validate($login, $password) {
00100       foreach ($this->pluginsObject->listPlugins() as $authPlugin) {
00101         $return=$this->pluginsObject->runPluginFunc($authPlugin, "validate", array($login, $password));
00102         if ($return!=false) {
00103           // If auth successful, connect the user with the username returned
00104                                         // by the plugin :
00105                                         $this->connect($return);
00106                                         // Keep a track of the plugin that did the auth, and exit the loop
00107                                         // successfully.
00108                                         $this->authMethod=$authPlugin;
00109                                         $_SESSION["AU_auth"]["authMethod"]=$authPlugin;
00110                                         return true;
00111                                 }
00112       }
00113       return false;
00114     }
00115 
00124                 protected function autoAuth() {
00125       // Call each plugin's autoAuth() method, and if one succeeds, save
00126       // its name for later disconnection
00127                         foreach ($this->pluginsObject->listPlugins() as $authPlugin) {
00128         $return=$this->pluginsObject->runPluginFunc($authPlugin, "autoAuth");
00129         if ($return!=false) {
00130           // If auth successful, connect the user :
00131                                         $this->connect($return);
00132           // Keep a track of the plugin that did the auth, and exit the loop
00133                                         // successfully.
00134           $this->authMethod=$authPlugin;
00135                             $_SESSION["AU_auth"]["authMethod"]=$authPlugin;
00136           return true;
00137         }
00138       }
00139                         return false;
00140                 }
00141 
00148     protected function connect($userName) {
00149       $this->connected=true;
00150       $this->userName=$userName;
00151       $_SESSION["AU_auth"]["userName"]=$userName;
00152     }
00153     
00157     protected function disconnect() {
00158                         // Tell the plugin that did the auth to disconnect the user !
00159                         $this->pluginsObject->runPluginFunc($this->authMethod, "disconnect");
00160                         
00161                         // Mark the user as disconnected
00162       $this->connected=false;
00163       $this->userName="";
00164       $_SESSION["AU_auth"]=null;
00165     }
00166     
00177     protected function loadPlugins($pluginPath) {
00178       if (empty($pluginPath)) {
00179         // Missing plugins path ! 
00180         $this->eh->logCrit("AU_Auth::loadPlugins()", "Missing plugins path", "Call this function with the good parameters !");
00181         return false;
00182       }
00183       $this->pluginsObject=new PG_object($pluginPath);
00184       return true;
00185     }
00186 
00187     // Public functions
00188 
00193     function isConnected () {
00194       return $this->connected;
00195     }
00196 
00201     function getUserName() {
00202       return $this->userName;
00203     }
00204 
00212                 function getAuthMethod() {
00213                         return $this->authMethod;
00214                 }
00215 
00224     function showBox() {
00225       $output="<!-- Begin auth box -->\n";
00226       $output.="<div class=\"auth\">\n";
00227       if ($this->isConnected()) {
00228         $output.="You are connected as <span class=\"user\">";
00229         $output.=$this->getUserName();
00230                                 $output.="</span> with the <span class=\"authMethod\">";
00231                                 $output.=$this->getAuthMethod();
00232                                 $output.="</span> method.\n";
00233         $output.=$this->showLink()."\n";
00234       }
00235       else { // Not connected
00236         $output.=$this->showForm()."\n";
00237       }
00238       $output.="</div>\n";
00239       $output.="<!-- End auth box -->\n";
00240 
00241       return $output;
00242     }

00244     // Constructor
00245 
00259     function __construct($pluginPath) {
00260       // Setup the error handler
00261       $this->eh=ER_Handler::getInstance();
00262       
00263       // Load the auth plugins
00264       if (empty($pluginPath)) {
00265         $this->eh->logCrit("AU_Auth constructor", "Missing plugins path", "Instanciate this object with the good parameters !");
00266         return false;
00267       }
00268       $this->loadPlugins($pluginPath);
00269       // Nasty debugging
00270       // print_r($this->pluginsObject);
00271       // echo "<br />\n";
00272 
00273       // Set the auth variables from session
00274       if (empty($_SESSION["AU_auth"])) {
00275         // If not connected, set default values
00276                           $this->connected=false;
00277                                 $this->userName="Unknown user";
00278                                 $this->authMethod="Unknown auth method";
00279       }
00280       else {
00281         // Else, we are connected and retrieve values from session
00282         $this->connected=true;
00283         $this->userName=$_SESSION["AU_auth"]["userName"];
00284                                 $this->authMethod=$_SESSION["AU_auth"]["authMethod"];                                                   
00285       }
00286 
00287       // Now, process actions
00288       if (!empty($_GET["AU_action"])) {
00289         switch ($_GET["AU_action"]) {
00290           case "close":
00291                                                 $this->disconnect(); break;
00292           case "connect":
00293                                                 // If we are already connected, forget it
00294                                                 if ($this->isConnected()) {break;}
00295                                                 // Else try to authenticate !
00296                                                 if ($_POST["AU_login"] && $_POST["AU_password"]) {
00297               // Verify password
00298               if ($this->validate($_POST["AU_login"], $_POST["AU_password"])) {
00299                 $this->eh->logInfo("Authentification", "You are now connected !", "Click on the 'Close this session' link to disconnect.");
00300                 }
00301                 else {
00302                 // Wrong password
00303                 $this->eh->logError("Authentification", "Wrong login and/or password !", "Check your login parameters and try again.");
00304                 }
00305                 }
00306                 else {
00307                 // Missing password and/or login (Form hacking ?)
00308                 $this->eh->logError("Authentification", "Wrong login and/or password !", "Check your login parameters and try again.");
00309                 }
00310                                                 break;
00311                                         case "autoConnect":
00312                                                 // If some plugins provide automatic authentification (Cas, Ssl,...),
00313                                                 // poll them now to try to get authenticated automagically
00314                                                 if( ! $this->isConnected() && $this->autoAuth()) {
00315                                 $this->eh->logInfo("Authentification", "You are now connected !", "Click on the 'Close this session' link to disconnect.");
00316                                                 }                                               
00317                                                 break;
00318         } // End of switch()
00319       } // End of actions
00320     } // End of constructor
00321   } // class AU_auth
